about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery Limited is engaged in the retail business of costume and fashion jewellery under the brand name "Gargi by P. N. Gadgil & Sons" launched in 2021 under the artificial jewellery segment.

The company deals in 92.5% certified sterling silver jewellery and brass jewellery, idols and other silverware and related gift items. PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery Limited offer a wide range of products from artificial jewellery segment for special occasions such as weddings and festivals to daily-wear jewellery for all ages, genders and across various price points.

The company have an extensive product list which includes earrings, necklaces, pendants, chains, finger rings, bracelets, anklets, nose pins, mangal sutra, pendant sets, bangles in brass or silver for females of age groups as well as male accessories such as rings, cufflinks, button set, that cater to our customers taste, preference, choice and the ever-changing trends in the chain and jewellery designs.

The company has an agreement with P.N. Gadgil & Sons Limited and P. N. Gadgil Art & Culture Foundation includes providing with security guards to all the stores, 24 hours a day where our POS Counters are present.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Long history, established and existing brand name of "P.N. Gadgil & Sons".
  • Extensive product list.
  • Hybrid Shopping model.
  • Experienced Promoters and a well-trained employee base.
  • Effective internal control and processes.

faqs.question: What is the PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO?
faqs.answer:
PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO is a SME IPO of 2600000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹7.80 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on December 8, 2022, and closes on December 13, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO opens on December 8, 2022 and closes on December 13, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO?
faqs.answer: PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO will be done on Friday, December 16, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, December 20, 2022. Check the PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The PNGS Gargi Fashion Jewellery IPO listing date is on Tuesday, December 20, 2022.
